name: EngineeringWord
0:
”Alexa open engineering word”
”Alexa ask engineering word for a word”
”Alexa tell engineering word to tell me a word”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: engineering word
des:
Ask for Engineering Word, and learn about terms, acronyms, slang, and jargon used in various engineering disciplines.

Engineering Word can help you study and improve your broad knowledge of engineering concepts.

To start, just say "Alexa, Engineering Word" or "Alexa, open Engineering Word" to get a word.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

Sponsored by the Engineering Word Of The Day podcast. Produced by Pios Labs. Learn more about the podcast at: http://engineeringwordoftheday.com/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
